name: EbertBattleSimon
_source: s;Ebert;It wasn't anything personal, Verstadt.{w}{br}None of this is, really.
s;Simon;To think you consider yourself worthy of nobility.{w}{br}It isn't just a title- it's a promise of loyalty and trust.
s;Ebert;To think the son of Bertholdt Verstadt would say such a thing.{w}{br}Your father slaughtered villages over minor slights.
s;Simon;Enough!{c:wait;600} I tire of your rhetoric and schemes.
